I bought this 4=movie spotlight series as I like Denzel Washington.  His acting is great and his performance doesn't disappoint.

The DVD's in this collection deliver perhaps the highest quality viewing I've enjoyed in a long time. With 4 movies I believed I was taking a chance. It seems the picture quality of virtually all DVDs in recent years has diminished enormously. I try to turn a blind eye to these annoyances but I sadly have come to expect that this is the status quo for these products these days. Even with the assurance of the security packaging which I presume authenticates that this is NOT a knock off, I am continuously disappointed. These movies were flawless from beginning to end. I was so surprised and amazed that I'm taking all this time
to detail my experience! As for the movies themselves they were all great! I'm a huge Denzel fan. His talents combined with this rare and amazing viewing experience really knocked it out of the park for me! I have just purchased my 1st blueray player in hopes of upping my viewing satisfaction and if it delivers what I've experienced in this particular DVD experience I'll be delighted tenfold!
It was great

Great no problems at all

I bought these knowing the quality of three of the films.  Only THE BONE COLLECTOR was new to me.  All four films are solid with excellent writing and four top-rank directors.  INSIDE MAN may be my favorite Spike Lee Joint since DO THE RIGHT THING.  The packaging does not rise to the quality of the movies themselves.  THE BONE COLLECTOR and THE HURRICANE share a single disk with long chapters, no subtitles, not even a convenient way to jump to a scene.  Still, I feel a piker for complaining.  This is a terrific collection for a minuscule price.
